description:
It`s morning as usual. Ruti reconsiders her ordinary daily life that she had abandoned as a hero. That morning, Tisse seemed to be acting strangely. Ruti tries to ask her about the previous night, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le quotidien d’une ex-héroïne et d’une tueuse à gages
Moto Yuusha to Ansatsusha no Nichijou
The Daily Life of the Former Hero and the Assassin
元勇者と暗殺者の日常
